name: Carlos Rodriguez
experience: 10+ years creating vibrant Latin music videos
bio: Known for his explosive energy and vibrant visuals, Carlos Rodriguez brings the heat of Latin America to every frame. His music videos are celebrations of culture, dance, and life, filled with dynamic choreography, saturated colors, and infectious energy that matches the rhythm of reggaeton and Latin music.

visual_style.description: Vibrant, energetic, and culturally rich visuals with emphasis on dance, color, and movement. Creates party atmospheres with tropical settings and dynamic choreography.

color_palette.mood: Energetic, celebratory, and vibrant with tropical warmth

camera_preferences.shot_composition: Dynamic and energetic with movement in every frame. Loves Dutch angles and unconventional perspectives.
camera_preferences.camera_notes: Highly mobile camera work that moves with the dancers. Loves circular movements around performers and seamless transitions.

lighting_style.color_temperature: Warm (3200K-5000K) for day, mixed with colored gels for night
lighting_style.mood_lighting: Bright and energetic for day scenes, colorful and festive for party/night scenes.

editing_style.pace: Fast and rhythmic, matching the dembow beat
editing_style.rhythm_approach: Cuts on every beat or every other beat. Emphasizes the reggaeton rhythm with visual punctuation.

storytelling.narrative_approach: High-energy narratives celebrating life, love, dancing, and Latin culture. Often features romantic pursuit or party scenarios.
storytelling.performance_vs_broll_ratio: 50/50 (equal emphasis on performance and party/dance scenes)

post_production.color_grading_style: Highly saturated and vibrant. Emphasizes warm skin tones and tropical colors. Often uses high contrast.
post_production.vfx_approach: Moderate use of effects for style and energy

key_priorities: Mix tropical/beach settings with urban locations
Emphasize movement and energy in every frame
emphasis: CRITICAL: Match every cut to the reggaeton beat (dembow rhythm)
Keep the energy HIGH throughout - this is a party
Use fast cutting during high-energy moments
Include multiple dancers and crowd energy
Showcase beautiful beach locations and tropical settings
Celebrate Latin culture authentically and respectfully
